titles.title: Providing amounts for the contingent fund of the House for expenses of investigations and studies by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries in the second session of the One Hundred Third Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Accounts.

bill.summary: 2/2/1994--Introduced. Provides amounts for expenses of investigations and studies by the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries in the second session of the 103d Congress.
